General.Name: Diagnostic Medical Systems SA
General.Description: Diagnostic Medical Systems S.A. operates in the medical imaging industry in France and internationally. The company offers radiography/fluoroscopy, retrofit kits, mammography, chest and bone rooms, mobiles, bone densitometry, 3D reconstruction, and mobile C-arms solutions. It also provides technologies for the treatment of osteoarthritis, and regenerative medicine based on the injection of fat stem cells. Diagnostic Medical Systems S.A. was founded in 1979 and is based in Mauguio, France.
